channel.description: Recent content in data storage on Alexander Lab @ WHOI

item.title: Using `rclone` to manage data on a remote server via Google Drive
item.description: There are a lot of reasons to set up Google Drive integration on your remote HPC system. In particular if your institution has provided you access to G Suite, there is a lot of storage available on Google Drive. Sometimes you might want to access files from multiple HPC systems, or have them at your fingertips on your local machine in addition to a remote server. This blog post will go over how to set up and use rclone with Google Drive on your remote server.
